description: Deletes a DNS zone. WARNING: All DNS records in the zone will also be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.

subscription_id.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

zone_name.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

if_match.description: The etag of the DNS zone. Omit this value to always delete the current zone. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.
